name: I tried Japan Airlines' INCREDIBLE First Class! (Ultimate Luxury?)
description:
Secure your privacy with  @Surfshark  ! Enter coupon code WINGINIT for an
extra 3 months free at https://surfshark.deals/winginit

Ever since I started collecting Avios back in 2014 I have *always* wanted to try Japan Airlines (JAL) - in their iconic first class! And, in today's video, I finally get the chance to jet over 6,000 miles in it. What a privilege - and the food was just spectacular! I hope you enjoy watching this video as much as I loved making it.

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¬¶ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit

0:00 Intro
1:00 DFW Airport and AA Flagship Lounge
4:19 JAL 777-300ER seating quirks (there aren't many seats!)
5:15 Surfshark sponsor ad
6:33 Boarding JAL 777-300ER in first class!
8:32 Taxi and takeoff
9:30 Inflight ambience and seat tour
11:26 Inflight meal and menus! Wow.
15:07 IFE and amenity kit
16:10 Bathroom tour!
17:25 Testing out the HUGE BED
18:30 Second full meal service
19:28 Landing and conclusions and thank you!



My website: www.winginit.me

Date of Travel: 25 JAN 2024
Airline: Japan Airlines (JAL)
Livery: JAL standard livery 
Route: DFW-HND
Aircraft: Boeing 777-300ER
Flight Number: JL 11
Miles: 6449
Airborne time: 12h 46m
